
/**
 * @worklet
 */
export type AnimationRunner = (
  setup: number,
  work: number,
  previous: AnimationState,
  current: Animated.SharedValue<AnimationState>,
) => void;
 
const run: AnimationRunner;

const style = useAnimatedStyle(() => {
  run(setup.value, work.value, previous.value, current);
  const {translateX, scaleX, opacity, backgroundColor} = current.value;
  return {
    transform: [{translateX}, {scaleX}],
    opacity,
    backgroundColor,
  };
});
